name: Priest's Pack
description: A religious kit containing ceremonial supplies and basic adventuring gear for traveling clergy. Unpacking equips a backpack and places all contents inside it.
notes: Contains: Backpack, Blanket, Robes, Holy Water Flask, Rations (2 days), Tinderbox, Candle (10), Waterskin
Must not be wearing a backpack to unpack
Unpacking equips backpack and places contents inside
Single use item - consumed when unpacked
